title: Baghchal
description: A digital adaptation of the traditional Nepali board game Baghchal, featuring an interactive UI and intelligent game logic.

title: Artistry Novel
description: An e-commerce platform for purchasing and selling artwork, built with Next.js and Mongodb and integrated with khalti test payment gateway.

title: Farm Saathi
description: A user-friendly UI for Farm Saathi, providing crop and fertilizer recommendations using machine learning.

title: Hamro Blood Connect
description: A web-based system to manage blood donation and requests, facilitating efficient blood bank operations.

title: NewsHub
description: A simple, beginner friendly news aggregator website created with react.js and newsdata.io api

title: ForecastFlow
description: A web application created with react.js and openweathermap api to view the current weather and 5 days forecast of any city
